thread.title: Service on Port Jefferson Branch Reduced September 12 - 13 for Track WorkTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Service on Port Jefferson Branch Reduced September 12 - 13 for Track WorkTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Service on Port Jefferson Branch Reduced September 12 - 13 for Track WorkTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Service on Port Jefferson Branch Reduced September 12 â€“ 13 for Track Work
Service on the Huntington/Port Jefferson Branch will be reduced between Hicksville and Huntington, from one train every half-hour to one train every hour, and between Port Jefferson and Huntington, from one train every 90 minutes to one train every two hours Saturday, September 12 and Sunday, September 13 when one track is taken out of regular service to due to rail layout work and preparation for upcoming track programs. The work will begin at 12:53 a.m. on Saturday and continue through 12:35 a.m. Monday. Normal train schedules will be restored in time for the Monday morning rush hour.
Westbound
Service between Port Jefferson and Huntington runs every two hours. Service between Huntington and Hicksville is reduced from half-hourly to hourly. Customers traveling to Carle Place and New Hyde Park, from points east on the Port Jefferson Branch, will transfer/change trains at Hicksville and can expect up to 30 minutes additional travel time.
Eastbound
Service between Huntington and Port Jefferson runs every two hours. Service between Hicksville and Huntington is reduced from half-hourly to hourly. Customers boarding at stations New Hyde Park or Carle Place will transfer/change trains at Hicksville, for points east on the Port Jefferson Branch, and can expect up to 30 minutes additional travel time.
Source:- MTA
